# 履歴

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gtsummary)
```

```{r}
load("../CYDER_ENQ4/data/CYDER2020A.rda")
```

```{r}
CYDER2020A -> .d
```

```{r}
.d %>% gtsummary::tbl_cross("理解","イン発生")
```

```{r}
CYDER2020A %>% names
c(1,2,3,7,10,17,26,28,29:42) -> omit_col
```


```{r}
CYDER2020A[,-omit_col] %>% gtsummary::tbl_summary() %>% bold_labels()
```
